item.title: CVE-2019-16791|2024-08-05T01:24:47.238Z -- snawoot -- postfix-mta-sts-resolver
item.description: In postfix-mta-sts-resolver before 0.5.1, All users can receive incorrect response from daemon under rare conditions, rendering downgrade of effective STS policy.
